entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 after midnight. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
